duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in managing the day to day operations of the office.
Greet and register office vendors and visitors.
Manage office access for employees/new hires by creating, replacing, and terminating access cards.
Assist in maintaining the overall appearance, maintenance, organization, and cleanliness of the office areas.
Restock and maintain inventory and supply management of office supplies, cleaning supplies, etc.
Own and organize office storage closets and coordination with stakeholders.
Own and organize incoming mail and the mail room on a daily basis.
Assist in facilitating in-office food and beverage programs.
Be an ambassador of company culture and values.
Assist in enforcing and suggesting updates to office policies, procedures, and safety standards.
Field daily inquiries by employees in the office on questions and issues.
Assist in facilitating the future of work plan for the office and advocate for department and team needs.
Utilize office management tools to assign desks, find meeting spaces, and facilitate meeting/event coordination.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Hospitality, or a related field (Associate's degree preferred)
